alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 02 at 3:02PM PDT until April 05 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible along the Cascade crest. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible along US 97 near Sunriver and La Pine. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph early Monday through Monday night. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
